name: What is International Women’s Day  (IWD) India 2021?
des: International Women’s Day India 2021 is an event  to celebrate and recognize the women who have influenced the tech industry and showcase the courage to create extraordinary things.

name: Who can register for IWD 2021 ?
des: Anyone can register and attend the event.  Also, we request you to adhere to our Community Guidelines.

name: Is it mandatory to register in order to participate in the event?
des: It will be great if you register to ensure you get live updates and important resources to your mailbox.

name: What are the event charges?
des: This event is completely free of charge.

name: Will the sessions be moderated?
des: Yes! We have dedicated volunteers who will moderate all the sessions. If you witness any attendee breaching the code of conduct, please reach out to us at iwdwtmindia@gmail.com.

name: Will I be able to access the sessions later?
des: Yes! The sessions will be recorded and would live on this website for you to access.

name: How can I gain more from the summit?
des: Please join the summit on time. We recommend that you participate in the interactive sessions. Along with cool swags, you get to forge new friendships with like-minded people.

name: How can I communicate my queries?
des: You may reach out to us at our email at: iwdwtmindia@gmail.com
